text: Tame kahi do ke ham mara palanahare phakata te kharaba vatone ja harama kari che, je spasta che ane je chupi che ane dareka papani vatane ane karana vagara ko'ina para atyacara karavane ane te vatane ke tame allaha sathe ko'i evi vastune bhagidara theravo, jena vise allaha'e ko'i purava nathi apya ane te vatane pana ke tame loko allaha vise evi vata kahi do jene tame nathi janata
